---
title: The Preliminary Contest for ICPC Asia Shenyang 2019
tags:
  - ACM
  - 题解
---

## [Light bulbs](https://nanti.jisuanke.com/t/41399)

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define maxm 1005
using namespace std;
pair<int, bool> pr[maxm << 1];
int t, n, m, l, r, cnt, x, y, b[maxm << 1];
int main(void)
{
	scanf("%d", &t);
	for (int i2 = 1; i2 <= t; i2++)
	{
		scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
		cnt = 0;
		for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++)
			scanf("%d%d", &x, &y), pr[++cnt] = {x, 1}, b[cnt] = x, pr[++cnt] = {y + 1, 0}, b[cnt] = y + 1;
		sort(pr + 1, pr + 1 + cnt);
		sort(b + 1, b + cnt + 1);
		int len = unique(b + 1, b + cnt + 1) - b - 1;
		//	for(int i=1;i<=cnt;i++)cout<<pr[i].first<<" "<<pr[i].second<<endl;
		//	for(int i=1;i<=len;i++)cout<<b[i]<<endl;
		int pt1 = 1, ans = 0, now = 0;
		for (int i = 1; i <= len; i++)
		{
			ans += (now % 2) * (pr[pt1].first - pr[pt1 - 1].first);
			while (b[i] == pr[pt1].first)
			{
				if (pr[pt1].second)
					now++;
				else
					now--;
				pt1++;
			}
			//-cout<<i<<" "<<b[i]<<" "<<pt1<<" "<<now<<" "<<ans<<endl;
		}
		printf("Case #%d: %d\n", i2, ans);
	}
}
```

## [Counting Sequences I](https://nanti.jisuanke.com/t/41412)

喜闻乐见的打表题。

```c
int main()
{
	int t, n;
	for (scanf("%d", &t); t--;)
	{
		scanf("%d", &n);
		printf("%d\n", a[n]);
	}
}
```

## [Stone game](https://nanti.jisuanke.com/t/41420)

完全背包搞一搞，要滚动内存。

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
struct Mod
{
	const ll M, SM;
	Mod(ll M) : M(M), SM(sqrt(M) + 0.5) {}
	ll qadd(ll &a, ll b) const { return a += b, a >= M ? a -= M : a; } //假如a和b都已经在同余系内，就不必取模了，取模运算耗时很高
	ll add(ll a, ll b) const { return qadd(a = (a + b) % M, M); }	  //考虑a和b不在同余系内甚至为负数的情况
	ll mul(ll a, ll b) const { return add(a * b, M); }
	ll inv(ll a) const { return pow(a, M - 2); } //要求M为素数，否则return pow(a, phi(M) - 1);
	ll pow(ll a, ll b) const
	{
		if (b < 0)
			a = inv(a), b = -b;
		ll r = 1;
		for (a = add(a, M); b; b >>= 1, a = mul(a, a))
			if (b & 1)
				r = mul(r, a);
		return r;
	}
	/*
	ll mul(ll a, ll b) const { return add(a * b, -M * ll((long double)a / M * b)); }
	ll mul(ll a, ll b) const //无循环快速计算同余乘法，根据a*b是否爆ll替换a*b%M，需要a<M且b<M，可以调用时手动取模
	{
		ll c = a / SM, d = b / SM;
		a %= SM, b %= SM;
		ll e = add(add(a * d, b * c), c * d / SM * (SM * SM - M));
		return add(add(a * b, e % SM * SM), add(c * d % SM, e / SM) * (SM * SM - M));
	}
	ll inv(ll a) const
	{ //模m下a的乘法逆元，不存在返回-1（m为素数时a不为0必有逆元）
		ll x, y, d = gcd(a, M, x, y);
		return d == 1 ? add(x, M) : -1;
	}
	vector<ll> sol(ll a, ll b) const //解同余方程，返回ax=b(mod M)循环节内所有解
	{
		vector<ll> ans;
		ll x, y, d = gcd(a, M, x, y);
		if (b % d)
			return ans;
		ans.push_back(mul((b / d) % (M / d), x));
		for (ll i = 1; i < d; ++i)
			ans.push_back(add(ans.back(), M / d));
		return ans;
	}
	ll log(ll a, ll b) const
	{
		unordered_map<ll, ll> x;
		for (ll i = 0, e = 1; i <= SM; ++i, e = mul(e, a))
			if (!x.count(e))
				x[e] = i;
		for (ll i = 0, v = inv(pow(a, SM)); i <= SM; ++i, b = mul(b, v))
			if (x.count(b))
				return i * SM + x[b];
		return -1;
	}
	*/
} M(1e9 + 7);
const ll N = 333;
ll a[N], f[N << 9], s[N << 9];
int main()
{
	ll t, n;
	for (scanf("%lld", &t); t--;)
	{
		scanf("%lld", &n);
		ll sum = 0, ans = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			scanf("%lld", &a[i]), sum += a[i];
		sort(a, a + n, greater<ll>());
		memset(s, 0, sizeof(s));
		f[0] = s[0] = 1;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			for (int j = sum; j >= 0; --j)
			{
				M.qadd(s[j], f[j] = j >= a[i] ? s[j - a[i]] : 0);
				if (j - a[i] <= sum - j && sum - j <= j)
					M.qadd(ans, f[j]);
			}
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
}
```

## [Peekaboo](https://nanti.jisuanke.com/t/41421)

过的人略少，但其实很简单，圆上整点模板题。先求出两个圆$x^2+y^2=a$,$x^2+y^2=b$上所有整点，随后两两暴力检查距离是否为 c 即可。圆上整点是一个数论问题，网上题解一大把。

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
inline ll pf(ll x) { return x * x; }
#define ok(xa, ya, xb, yb)                              \
	{                                                   \
		if (pf(c) == pf((xa) - (xb)) + pf((ya) - (yb))) \
			ans.emplace_back(xa, ya, xb, yb);           \
	}
vector<ll> work(ll r)
{
	vector<ll> d, ans;
	for (ll i = 1; i * i <= r * 2; ++i)
		if (r * 2 % i == 0)
			d.push_back(i), d.push_back(r * 2 / i);
	for (ll i = 0; i < d.size(); ++i)
	{
		for (ll rd2 = 2 * r / d[i], a = 1; 2 * a * a <= rd2; ++a)
		{
			ll A = a * a, B = rd2 - A, b = sqrt(B + 0.5);
			if (b * b == B && A != B && __gcd(A, B) == 1)
			{
				ans.push_back(d[i] * a * b);
			}
		}
	}
	sort(ans.begin(), ans.end());
	ans.resize(unique(ans.begin(), ans.end()) - ans.begin());
	for (int n = ans.size(), i = 0; i < n; ++i)
		ans.push_back(-ans[i]);
	ans.push_back(0);
	ans.push_back(r);
	ans.push_back(-r);
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	ll t, a, b, c;
	for (scanf("%lld", &t); t--;)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &a, &b, &c);
		vector<ll> xa = work(a), xb = work(b);
		vector<tuple<ll, ll, ll, ll>> ans;
		for (ll i = 0; i < xa.size(); ++i)
		{
			ll ya = sqrt(a * a - xa[i] * xa[i]);
			for (ll j = 0; j < xb.size(); ++j)
			{
				ll yb = sqrt(b * b - xb[j] * xb[j]);
				ok(xa[i], ya, xb[j], yb);
				ok(xa[i], -ya, xb[j], yb);
				ok(xa[i], ya, xb[j], -yb);
				ok(xa[i], -ya, xb[j], -yb);
			}
		}
		sort(ans.begin(), ans.end());
		ans.resize(unique(ans.begin(), ans.end()) - ans.begin());
		cout << ans.size() << '\n';
		for (auto p : ans)
			printf("%lld %lld %lld %lld\n", get<0>(p), get<1>(p), get<2>(p), get<3>(p));
	}
}
```

## [Digit sum](https://nanti.jisuanke.com/t/41422)

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 50;
int T, N, b;
int a[maxn], ad[maxn];
int main()
{
	scanf("%d", &T);
	for (int t = 1; t <= T; t++)
	{
		scanf("%d%d", &N, &b);

		int d = 0;
		a[d] = 1;
		while (a[d] < N)
			a[++d] = a[d - 1] * b;

		int tot = b * (b - 1) / 2, ans = 0;
		for (int i = 1; i <= d; i++)
			ad[i] = tot * i * a[i - 1];
		for (int i = d; i >= 0; i--)
		{
			int now = N / a[i];
			N %= a[i];
			ans += (now - 1) * now / 2 * a[i] + now * (N + 1);
			ans += now * ad[i];
		}
		printf("Case #%d: %d\n", t, ans);
	}
}
```
